title: Himanshu Sharma Is Instructing The World On The Unknown Tech Life - Outlook India
content: Himanshu Sharma Is Instructing The World On The Unknown Tech Life  Outlook India
description: Himanshu has been working in the field of bug bounties, generally known as the VRP (vulnerability reward programme) for almost 13 years now. Himanshu's work entails a crowdsourcing programme that compensates those who find and report software flaws.
